name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience in designing and implementing high-performance software solutions, proficient in **Go lang**, **React**, **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and cloud services including **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**. Extensive expertise in **microservices architecture**, **API design**, and deploying cloud-native applications, leveraging **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and CI/CD best practices to ensure efficient development workflows and reliable production environments. Strong focus on cost optimization and cloud commitment management, with a demonstrated ability to design robust architectures that implement effective cloud billing models.

Skilled in building secure, scalable systems, with hands-on experience in databases such as **BigQuery**, **ClickHouse**, and **Firestore**. Proven track record in implementing GitOps practices to streamline deployment processes. Exceptional communication and collaboration skills, dedicated to driving team success and delivering impactful software solutions that adhere to compliance standards and best practices.
